original_text: Then Darius the king made a decree, and search was made in Babylonia, in the house of the archives where the documents were stored.
korean_text: 이에 다리오 왕이 조서를 내려 문서창고 곧 바벨론의 보물을 쌓아둔 보물전각에서 조사하게 하여

sentences.original_text: Then Darius the king made a decree
and search was made in Babylonia
in the house of the archives
